ui.title: 雨中冒险2 物品和装备
ui.donate: 在 ko-fi.com 上送我一杯咖啡
ui.search-placeholder: 搜索名称、标签、稀有度和描述
ui.noitemfound: 未找到符合条件的物品。

missinguid_repulsionArmorPlate.name: 推斥护甲板
missinguid_repulsionArmorPlate.description: 降低所有 #[offense:承受伤害] #[offense:5] #[+5] 点。最低减小至 #[offense:1] 点.

BarrierOnKill.name: 黄晶胸针
BarrierOnKill.description: 击杀时获得等同于 #[defense:15生命值] #[+15] 的 #[defense:临时屏障]。

Bear.name: 更艰难的时光
Bear.description:
#[defense:15%] #[+15%] 的几率 #[defense:格挡] 所受伤害。
#[misc:不受幸运机制影响]。

BleedOnHit.name: 三尖匕首
BleedOnHit.description: #[offense:10%] #[+10%] 的几率使一位敌人 #[offense:流血]，造成总计 #[offense:240%] 的基础伤害。

BossDamageBonus.name: 穿甲弹
BossDamageBonus.description: 对 BOSS 造成 #[offense:20%] #[+20%] 额外伤害。

CritGlasses.name: 透镜制作者的眼镜
CritGlasses.description: 你的攻击有 #[offense:10%] #[+10%] 几率 #[offense:暴击]，造成 #[offense:双倍伤害]。

Crowbar.name: 撬棍
Crowbar.description: 对 #[offense:90%以上血量] 敌人造成 #[offense:75%] #[+75%] 额外伤害。
Crowbar.unlock: 发现 10 种不同的白色物品。

Firework.name: 一捆烟花
Firework.description: 打开箱子会 #[offense:发射8枚] #[+4] #[offense:烟花]，每枚造成 #[offense:300%] 基础伤害.
Firework.unlock: 在一台3D打印机中连续打出 7 个相同物品。

RegeOnKill.name: 野牛肉排
RegeOnKill.description: #[defense:最大生命值] 提高 #[defense:25] #[+25] 点。

HealWhileSafe.name: 谨慎的蛞蝓
HealWhileSafe.description: 脱离战斗时，提高 #[defense:基础生命回复] #[defense:+3 hp/s] #[+3 hp/s]。

Hoof.name: 保罗的山羊蹄
Hoof.unlock: 在机遇神龛上连续失败 3 次。

IgniteOnKill.name: 汽油
IgniteOnKill.description:
击杀敌人会 #[offense:点燃] 所有 #[offense:12m] #[+4m] 之内的敌人。
#[offense:燃烧] 敌人 #[offense:150%] #[+75%] 的基础伤害。

Medkit.name: 医疗包
Medkit.description: 受到伤害的2秒之后, #[defense:治疗] #[defense:20] 点加上额外 #[defense:5%] #[+5%] 的 #[defense:最大生命值]。

Mushroom.name: 爆裂真菌
Mushroom.description: 站定不动 #[defense:2] 秒，将会生成一个半径 #[defense:3m] #[+1.5m] 的区域，每秒对其中所有友方单位 #[defense:治疗] #[defense:4.5%] #[+2.25%] 你的 #[defense:生命值]。

NearbyDamageBonus.name: 凝神水晶
NearbyDamageBonus.description: 对 #[offense:13m] 内的敌人造成额外 #[offense:20%] #[+20%] 伤害。

PersonalShield.name: 个人护盾生成器
PersonalShield.description: 获得等同于你最大生命值 #[defense:8%] #[+8%] 的 #[defense:护盾]。在战斗外恢复。

missinguid_itemScrapWhite.name: 物品碎片，白色
missinguid_itemScrapWhite.description: 无效果，优先被3D打印机使用。

SecondarySkillMagazine.name: 备用弹夹
SecondarySkillMagazine.description: 增加 #[misc:+1] #[+1] #[misc:次要技能] 的充能数。
SecondarySkillMagazine.unlock: 不受到任何伤害完全充能传送器。

StickyBomb.name: 黏弹
StickyBomb.description: 击中时有 #[offense:5%] #[+5%] 的几率在敌人身上附着一颗 #[offense:炸弹]，爆炸造成 #[offense:180%] 总伤害。

StunChanceOnHit.name: 眩晕手雷
StunChanceOnHit.description: 击中时有 #[misc:5%] #[+5%] 的几率 #[misc:眩晕] 敌人 #[misc:2] 秒。

Tooth.name: 怪物牙齿
Tooth.description: 杀死一个敌人生成 #[defense:治疗球]，治疗 #[defense:8] 点加上额外 #[defense:2%] #[+2%] 你的 #[defense:最大生命值]。

TreasureCache.name: 生锈的钥匙
TreasureCache.description:
#[misc:每个场景] 会在随机位置生成一个 #[misc:隐藏箱]，包含一个物品 （#[defense:80%]/#[debuff:20%]）。
打开箱子 #[消耗] 该钥匙。

LevelBonus.name: 战旗
LevelBonus.description:
在 #[misc:升级] 或开启 #[misc:传送器时间] 时，掉落一个会在 #[misc:16m] #[+8m] 内强化所有友军单位的旗帜。
#[offense:攻击] 和 #[misc:移动速度] 提高 #[offense:30%]。

AttackSpeedOnCrit.name: 捕食本能
AttackSpeedOnCrit.description:
#[offense:暴击] 使 #[offense:攻击速度] 提高 #[offense:12%]。
最大提高 #[offense:36%] #[+24%] #[offense:攻击速度]。

Bandolier.name: 子弹带
Bandolier.description: 击杀时有 #[misc:18%] #[+10%] 几率掉落一个可以 #[misc:重置所有冷却] 的弹药包。

BonusGoldPackOnKill.name: 古尔的巨著
BonusGoldPackOnKill.description: 击杀时有 #[misc:4%] #[+4%] 的几率掉落一个价值 #[misc:25{'$'}] 的宝物。 #[misc:随时间调整]。

ChainLightning.name: 尤克里里
ChainLightning.description: #[offense:25%] 的几率发射 #[offense:连锁闪电] 造成 #[offense:80%] 总伤害，最多 #[offense:20m] #[+2m] 内的 #[offense:3] #[+2] 名目标。

missinguid_deathMark.name: 死亡标记
missinguid_deathMark.description: 拥有 #[offense:4] 种或更多减益效果的敌人被 #[offense:死亡标记], 从所有来源中承受 #[offense:50%] 更多伤害，持续 #[misc:7] #[+7] 秒。

EnergizedOnEquipmentUse.name: 战争号角
EnergizedOnEquipmentUse.description: 激活装备给予你 #[offense:+70%攻速]，持续 #[offense:8] #[+4] 秒。
EnergizedOnEquipmentUse.unlock: 一个场景中完成 3 个战斗神龛。

EquipmentMagazine.name: 燃料电池
EquipmentMagazine.description:
拥有 #[+1] #[misc:额外装备充能].
#[misc:装备冷却时间] 降低 #[misc:15%] #[+15%]。
EquipmentMagazine.unlock: 拾起五种不同类型的装备。

ExecuteLowHealthElite.name: 陈旧断头台
ExecuteLowHealthElite.description: 立即斩杀 #[debuff:生命值] 低于 #[debuff:13%] #[+13%] 的精英怪物。

ExplodeOnDeath.name: 鬼火
ExplodeOnDeath.description: 击杀敌人时生成一个 #[offense:岩浆柱]，在 #[offense:12m] #[+2.4m] 半径内造成 #[offense:350%] #[+280%] 基础伤害。

FireRing.name: 贾罗的手环
FireRing.description: 若击中时造成 #[offense:超过400%伤害]，生成一个 #[offense:符文火焰龙卷] 袭击敌人，持续造成 #[offense:300%] #[+300%] 总伤害。每 #[misc:10] 秒重新充能。
FireRing.unlock: TODO Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandonned Aqueduct.

HealOnCrit.name: 收割者镰刀
HealOnCrit.description:
获得 #[offense:5%暴击率]。
#[offense:暴击] #[defense:治疗] #[defense:8] #[+4] 点 #[defense:生命]。

IceRing.name: 鲁纳德的手环
IceRing.description: 若击中时造成 #[offense:超过400%伤害]，生成一个 #[offense:符文冰霜爆破] 袭击敌人，#[misc:迟缓] 敌人 #[misc:80%]，持续 #[misc:3] #[+3] 秒，并造成 #[offense:250%] #[+250%] 总伤害。每 #[misc:10] 秒重新充能。
IceRing.unlock: TODO Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandonned Aqueduct.

Infusion.name: 浸剂
Infusion.description: 杀死一个敌人永久提高你的 #[defense:生命上限] #[defense:1] 点，#[defense:最多] 提高 #[defense:100] #[+100] 点 #[defense:生命]。

JumpBoost.name: 蜡鹌鹑
JumpBoost.unlock: 达到 +300% 移动速度（包括冲刺）。

Missile.name: AtG导弹Mk.1
Missile.description: #[offense:10%] 几率发射一枚导弹，造成 #[offense:300%] #[+300%] 总伤害。

Phasing.name: 老旧战争潜行工具
Phasing.description:
低于 #[debuff:25%生命值] 时使你获得 #[misc:40%移动速度] 和 #[misc:隐身]，持续 #[misc:5] 秒.
每 #[misc:30秒] #[-50%] 秒重新充能。

missinguid_itemScrapGreen.name: 物品碎片，绿色
missinguid_itemScrapGreen.description: 无效果，优先被3D打印机使用。

Seed.name: 吸血种子
Seed.description: 造成伤害时 #[defense:治疗] 你 #[defense:1] #[+1] 点 #[defense:生命]。

SlowOnHit.name: 时空装置
SlowOnHit.description: #[misc:减速] 敌人 #[misc:-60% 移动速度]，持续 #[misc:2] #[+2] 秒。

SprintOutOfCombat.name: 红鞭子
SprintOutOfCombat.description: 脱离战斗时 #[misc:移动速度] 提高 #[misc:30%] #[+30%]。

missinguid_squidPolyp.name: 乌贼增生体
missinguid_squidPolyp.description: 激活一个可互动物会召唤一个 #[offense:乌贼炮台]，以 #[offense:100%] #[+100%] #[offense:攻击速度] 攻击附近的敌人。持续 #[misc:30] 秒。
missinguid_squidPolyp.unlock: 一次游戏中激活 6 个炮台。

TPHealingNova.name: 轻粒子雏菊
TPHealingNova.description: 在传送器事件中释放 #[defense:治疗新星]，#[defense:治疗] 所有附近友军单位 #[defense:50%] 他们的最大生命值。出现 #[defense:1] #[+1] 次。

Thorns.name: 剃刀尖网
Thorns.description:
被击中使你爆炸，迸发一阵剃刀，造成 #[offense:160%伤害]。
最多在半径 #[offense:25m] #[+10m] 内击中 #[offense:5] #[+2] 个敌人。

WarCryOnMultiKill.name: 狂战士肩甲
WarCryOnMultiKill.description:
#[offense:1] 秒内 #[offense:杀死3个敌人] 使你 #[offense:狂暴]，持续 #[offense:6] #[+4] 秒.
#[misc:移动速度] 提高 #[misc:50%]，#[offense:攻击速度] 提高 #[offense:100%]。
WarCryOnMultiKill.unlock: 以低于 10% 生命值的方式充能传送器。

ArmorReductionOnHit.name: 粉碎之正义
ArmorReductionOnHit.description: 击中一个敌人 #[offense:5] 次后，降低其 #[offense:护甲] #[offense:60] 点，持续 #[offense:8] #[+8] 秒。

BarrierOnOverHeal.name: 庇护
BarrierOnOverHeal.description: 治疗溢出给予你最大 #[defense:50%] #[+50%] #[defense:治疗量] 的 #[defense:临时屏障]。

Behemoth.name: 完美巨兽
Behemoth.description: 你的所有 #[offense:攻击会爆炸]， 对半径 #[offense:4m] #[+1.5m] 范围内的敌人造成额外 #[offense:60%] 总伤害.

BounceNearby.name: 感应肉钩
BounceNearby.description: 击中时有 #[offense:20%] #[+20%] 几率对做多 #[offense:10] #[+5] 个敌人 #[offense:发射追踪钩]，造成 #[offense:100%] 总伤害。

missinguid_defensiveMicrobots.name: 防御用微型机器人
missinguid_defensiveMicrobots.description: 每 #[offense:0.5秒] 击坠 #[offense:20m] 内的 #[offense:1] #[+1] 个投射物。#[misc:充能速度随攻速变化]。

Clover.name: 57片叶子的三叶草
Clover.description: 所有随机效果额外重掷 #[misc:+1] #[+1] 次， #[misc:取更好的结果]。
Clover.unlock: 一次游戏中完成20个场景。

Dagger.name: 仪式用匕首
Dagger.description: 杀死一个敌人生成 #[offense:3把追踪匕首]，造成 #[offense:150%] #[+150%] 基础伤害。

ExtraLife.name: 迪奥最好的朋友
ExtraLife.description: #[misc:濒死时]，该物品将被 #[misc:消耗] 使你 #[defense:复活] 并 #[defense:无敌3秒]。

FallBoots.name: H3AD-5T v2
FallBoots.description:
提高 #[misc:跳跃高度]。
Creates a #[offense:5m-100m] radius #[offense:kinetic explosion] on hitting the ground, dealing #[offense:1000%-10000%] base damage that scales up with #[offense:fall distance].
Recharges in #[offense:10] #[-50%] seconds.

GhostOnKill.name: 欢乐面具
GhostOnKill.description: Killing enemies has a #[offense:7%] chance to #[offense:spawn a ghost] of the killed enemy with #[offense:1500%] damage. Lasts #[offense:30s] #[+30s].

HeadHunter.name: 秃鹫的苏醒
HeadHunter.description: 获得被击杀精英敌人的 #[offense:能力]，持续 #[offense:8] #[+5] 秒。

Icicle.name: 冰霜圣物
Icicle.description:
Killing an enemy surrounds you with an #[offense:ice storm] that deals #[offense:600% damage per second] and #[misc:slows] enemies by #[misc:80%] for #[misc:1.5s].
The storm #[offense:grows with every kill], increasing it's radius by #[offense:1m].
Stacks up to #[offense:6m] #[+6m].

IncreaseHealing.name: 回春支架
IncreaseHealing.unlock: 不受到治疗的情况下，到达并完成第 3 个传送器事件。

KillEliteFrenzy.name: 脑部跟踪
KillEliteFrenzy.description: Upon killing an elite monster, #[offense:enter a frenzy] for #[offense:4s] #[+4s] where #[misc:skills have no cooldowns].
KillEliteFrenzy.unlock: Defeat an Elite boss on Monsoon difficulty.

LaserTurbine.name: 共鸣圆盘
LaserTurbine.description:
Killing #[offense:4] enemies in #[misc:7 seconds] charges the Resonance Disc.
The disc launches itself toward a target for #[offense:300%] base damage #[+300%], piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for #[offense:1000%] base damage #[+1000%].
Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for #[offense:300%] base damage #[+300%].

NovaOnHeal.name: 恩库哈纳的意见
NovaOnHeal.description:
Store #[defense:100%] #[+100%] of healing as #[defense:Soul Energy].
After your #[defense:Soul Energy] reaches #[defense:10%] of your #[defense:maximum health], #[offense:fire a skull] that deals #[offense:250%] of your #[defense:Soul Energy] as #[offense:damage].

missinguid_interstellarDeskPlant.name: 星际桌子工厂
missinguid_interstellarDeskPlant.description:
On kill, plant a #[defense:healing] fruit seed that grows into a plant after #[misc:5] seconds.
The plant #[defense:heals] for #[defense:10%] of #[defense:maximum health] every second to all allies withing #[defense:5m] #[+5m]. Last #[misc:10] seconds.

missinguid_itemScrapRed.name: 物品碎片，红色
missinguid_itemScrapRed.description: 无效果，优先被3D打印机使用。

ShockNearby.name: 不稳定的特斯拉线圈
ShockNearby.description:
Fire out #[offense:lightning] that hits #[offense:3] #[+2] enemies for #[offense:200%] base damage every #[offense:0.5s].
The Tesla Coil switches off every #[offense:10 seconds].

Talisman.name: 灵魂绑定触媒
Talisman.unlock: Discover and activate 8 unique Newt Altars.

UtilitySkillMagazine.name: 强光补燃器
UtilitySkillMagazine.description:
Add #[misc:+2] #[+2] charges of your #[misc:Utility skill].
#[misc:Reduces Utility skill cooldown] by #[misc:33%].

missinguid_artifactKey.name: 神器钥匙
missinguid_artifactKey.description: A stone shard with immense power.

BeetleGland.name: 女王的腺体
BeetleGland.description:
Every 30 seconds, #[misc:summon a Beetle Guard] with bonus #[offense:300%] damage and #[defense:100%] health.
Can have up to #[misc:1] #[+1] Guards at a time.

missinguid_shatterspleen.name: 易爆的脾脏
missinguid_shatterspleen.description: #[offense:Critical Strikes bleed] enemies for #[offense:240%] base damage. #[offense:Bleeding] enemies #[offense:explode] on death for #[offense:400%] #[+400%] damage, plus an additional #[offense:15%] #[+15%] of their maximum health.

missinguid_moltenPerforator.name: 熔融钻机
missinguid_moltenPerforator.description: #[offense:10%] chance on hit to call forth #[offense:3 magma balls] from an enemy, dealing #[offense:300%] #[+300%] damage each.

Knurl.name: 巨型隆起
Knurl.description: #[defense:Increases maximum health] by #[defense:40] #[+40] and #[defense:base health regeneration] by #[defense:+1.6 hp/s] #[+1.6 hp/s].

missinguid_chargedPerforator.name: 电能钻机
missinguid_chargedPerforator.description: #[offense:10%] chance on hit to do down a lightning strike, dealing #[offense:500%] #[+500%] damage.

NovaOnLowHealth.name: 创世之环
NovaOnLowHealth.description: Falling below #[debuff:25% health] causes you to explode, dealing #[offense:6000% base damage]. Recharges every #[misc:30 seconds] #[-50%].

missinguid_empathyCores.name: 共情核心
missinguid_empathyCores.description: Every 30 seconds, #[misc:summon two Solus Probes] that gain #[offense:+100%] #[+100%] damage per #[misc:ally on your team].

missinguid_itemScrapYellow.name: 物品碎片，黄色
missinguid_itemScrapYellow.description: 无效果，优先被3D打印机使用。

missinguid_miredUrn.name: 泥沼之瓮
missinguid_miredUrn.description: While in combat, the nearest 1 #[+1] characters to you within #[offense:13m] whill be "tethered" to you, dealing #[offense:100%] damage per second, applying #[offense:tar], and #[defense:healing] your for #[defense:100%] of the damage dealt.

SprintWisp.name: 小门徒
SprintWisp.description:
Fire a #[offense:tracking wisp] for #[offense:300%] #[+300%] #[offense:damage].
Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with #[misc:movement speed].

TitanGoldDuringTP.name: 哈雷肯种子
TitanGoldDuringTP.description:
Summon #[offense:Aurelionite] during the teleporter event.
It has #[offense:100%] #[+50%] #[offense:damage] and #[defense:100%] #[+100%] #[defense:health].

AutoCastEquipment.name: 溺死者的心意
AutoCastEquipment.description:
#[misc:Reduce equipment cooldown] by #[misc:50%] #[+15%].
Forces your Equipment to #[misc:activate] whenever it is off #[misc:cooldown].
AutoCastEquipment.unlock: Kill 20 Hermit Crabs by chasing them off the edge of the map.

missinguid_focusedConvergence.name: 专注趋同
missinguid_focusedConvergence.description: Teleporters charge #[misc:30%] #[+30%] #[misc:faster], but the size of the Teleporter zone is #[debuff:50%] #[-50%] smaller.
missinguid_focusedConvergence.unlock: In 4 consecutives stages, don't leave the teleporter radius until it is fully charged.

GoldOnHit.name: 易碎王冠
GoldOnHit.description:
#[misc:30% chance on hit] to gain #[misc:2] #[+2] #[misc:gold]. #[misc:Scales over time].
#[debuff:Lose gold] equal to #[debuff:100%] #[+100%] of amount your are hit for OR lose % gold equal to #[debuff:100%] #[+100%] of the maximum health % you lost.
Chooses the greater of the two.

missinguid_purity.name: 纯净
missinguid_purity.description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by #[misc:2] #[+1] seconds. All random effects are rolled #[misc:+1] #[+1] times for an #[debuff:unfavorable outcome].
missinguid_purity.unlock: Beat the game in Monsoon difficulty.

LunarDagger.name: 塑性玻璃
LunarDagger.description:
Increase base damage by #[offense:100%] #[+100%].
#[defense:Reduce maximum health by 50%] #[+50%].

LunarPrimaryReplacement.name: 异端幻象
LunarPrimaryReplacement.description:
#[misc:Replace your Primary Skill] with #[misc:Hungering Gaze].
Fire a flurry of #[misc:tracking shards] that detonate after a delay, dealing #[offense:120%] base damage. Hold up to 12 charges #[+12] that reload after 2 seconds #[+2].

missinguid_hookOfHeresy.name: 异端之钩
missinguid_hookOfHeresy.description:
#[misc:Replace your Secondary Skill] with #[misc:Slicing Maelstrom].
Charge up a projectile that deals #[offense:175% damage per second] to nearby enemies, exploding after #[misc:3] seconds to deal #[offense:700% damage] and #[offense:root] enemies for #[misc:3] #[+3] seconds. Recharges after 5 #[+5] seconds.
missinguid_hookOfHeresy.unlock: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

missinguid_essenceOfHeresy.name: 异端精华
missinguid_essenceOfHeresy.description:
#[misc:Replace your Special Skill] with #[misc:Ruin].
Dealing damage adds a stack of #[offense:Ruin] for 10 #[+10] seconds. Activating the skill #[offense:detonates] all Ruin stack at unlimited range, dealing #[offense:300% damage] plus #[offense:120% damage per stack of Ruin].
Recharges after 8 #[+8] seconds.
missinguid_essenceOfHeresy.unlock: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

LunarTrinket.name: 忠诚之珠
LunarTrinket.unlock: Unlock the new zone from the "Hidden Realms" update when you obliterate with this item.

LunarUtilityReplacement.name: 异端跨越
LunarUtilityReplacement.description:
#[misc:Replace your Utility Skill] with #[misc:Shadowfade].
Fade away, becoming #[misc:intangible] and gaining #[misc:+30% movement speed]. #[defense:Heal] for #[defense:25%] #[+25%] #[defense:of your maximum health]. Lasts 3 #[+3] seconds.
LunarUtilityReplacement.unlock: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

missinguid_defiantGouge.name: 抗争之穴
missinguid_defiantGouge.description: Using a Shrine summons #[debuff:enemies] nearby. #[misc:Scales over time].

missinguid_mercurialRachis.name: 变化叶脊
missinguid_mercurialRachis.description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within #[misc:16m] #[+50%], causing them to deal #[offense:+50%] damage.

RepeatHeal.name: 尸爆
RepeatHeal.description:
#[defense:Heal +100%] #[+100%] more.
#[defense:All healing is applied over time].
Can #[defense:heal] for a #[defense:maximum] of #[defense:10%] #[-50%] of your #[defense:health per second].

ShieldOnly.name: 超绝
ShieldOnly.description:
#[defense:Convert] all but #[defense:1 health] into #[defense:regenerating shields].
#[defense:Gain 50%] #[+25%] #[defense:maximum health].

BurnNearby.name: 地狱火酊剂
BurnNearby.description:
Ignite ALL characters within 8m. Deal #[offense:5% of your maximum health/second as burning] to yourself.
The burn is #[offense:0.5x] stronger on allies, and #[offense:24x] stronger on enemies.
Cooldown: #[misc:45s]

CrippleWard.name: 悲伤雕像
CrippleWard.description:
ALL characters are #[misc:slowed by 50%] and has their #[offense:armor reduced by 20].
Can place up to #[misc:5].
Cooldown: #[misc:15s]

Meteor.name: 发光的陨石
Meteor.description:
#[offense:Rain meteors] from the sky, damaging ALL characters for #[offense:600% damage per blast].
Last 20 seconds.
Meteor.unlock: Carry 5 Lunar items in a single run.

Tonic.name: 尖晶强心剂
Tonic.description:
Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 15 seconds.
Increases #[offense:damage] by #[offense:+100%].
Increases #[offense:attack speed] by #[offense:+70%].
Increases #[offense:armor] by #[offense:+20].
Increases #[defense:maximum health] by #[defense:+50%].
Increases #[defense:passive health regeneration] by #[defense:+300%].
Increases #[misc:movespeed] by #[misc:+30%].
When the tonic wears off, you have #[debuff:20%] chance to gain a #[debuff:Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats] by #[debuff:-5%] #[-5%]
Tonic.unlock: Discover and enter three unique portals.

BFG.name: 前子蓄能器
BFG.description:
Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m up to #[offense:600% damage/second].
On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for #[offense:4000% damage].
Cooldown: #[misc:140s]
BFG.unlock: Open the Timed Security Chest on Rallypoint Delta.

Blackhole.name: 原始立方体
Blackhole.description:
Fire a black hole that #[misc:draws enemies within 30m into it's center]. Last 10 seconds.
Cooldown: #[misc:60s]

Cleanse.name: 爆破雨阵
Cleanse.description:
#[misc:Cleanse] all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.
Cooldown: #[misc:20s]

CommandMissile.name: 一次性导弹发射器
CommandMissile.description:
Fire a swarm of #[offense:12] missiles that deal #[offense:12x300%] damage.
Cooldown: #[misc:45s]

CritOnUse.name: 眼部平视显示
CritOnUse.description:
Gain #[offense:+100% Critical Strike Chance] for 8 seconds.
Cooldown: #[misc:60s]

missinguid_forgiveMePlease.name: 请原谅我
missinguid_forgiveMePlease.description:
Throw a cursed doll out that #[offense:triggers] any #[offense:On-kill] effects you have every #[misc:1] second for #[misc:8] seconds.
Cooldown: #[misc:45]

DroneBackup.name: 对讲机
DroneBackup.description:
Call #[offense:4 Strike Drones] to fight for you.
Last 25 seconds.
Cooldown: #[misc:100s]

FireBallDash.name: 火山之卵
FireBallDash.description:
Turn into a #[offense:draconic fireball] for #[offense:5] seconds. Deal #[offense:500% damage] on impact.
Detonates at the end for #[offense:800% damage].
Cooldown: #[misc:30s]

Fruit.name: 外来水果
Fruit.description:
Instantly heal for #[defense:50% of your maximum health].
Cooldown: #[misc:45s]

Gateway.name: 古怪花瓶
Gateway.description:
Create a #[misc:quantum tunnel] of up to #[misc:1000m] in length. Lasts 30 seconds.
Cooldown: #[misc:45s]
Gateway.unlock: Defeat the guardian of Gilded Coast without any beacons deactivating.

GoldGat.name: 集资的力量
GoldGat.description:
Fires a continuous barrage that deals #[offense:100% damage per bullet].
Costs {'$'}1 per bullet. Costs increases over time.
Cooldown: #[misc:5s]

Jetpack.name: 乳白色的茧
Jetpack.description:
Sprout wings and #[misc:fly for 15 seconds].
Gain #[misc:+20% movement speed] for the duration.
Cooldown: #[misc:60s]

missinguid_superMassiveLeech.name: 超巨型水蛭
missinguid_superMassiveLeech.description:
#[defense:Heal] for #[defense:20%] of the #[offense:damage] you deal. Lasts #[defense:8] seconds.
Cooldown: #[misc:60s]

Lightning.name: 皇家电容器
Lightning.description:
Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing #[offense:3000% damage] and #[offense:stunning] nearby monsters.
Cooldown: #[misc:20s]
Lightning.unlock: Defeat the Teleporter bosses after activating 2 Shrines of the Moutain.

PassiveHealing.name: 身形扭曲的木灵
PassiveHealing.description:
Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for #[defense:1.5% of your maximum health/second].
Can be sent to an ally to heal them for #[defense:10% of their maximum health].
Cooldown: #[misc:15s]
PassiveHealing.unlock: Fully upgrade a Shrine of the Woods.

missinguid_recycler.name: 回收机
missinguid_recycler.description:
#[misc:Transform] an Item or Equipment into a different one. #[misc:Can only be converted in the same tier one time].
Cooldown: #[misc:45s]
missinguid_recycler.unlock: Destroy  20 flying rocks in Sky Meadow.

missinguid_sawmerang.name: 回旋锯
missinguid_sawmerang.description:
Throw #[offense:three large saw blades] that slice through enemies for #[offense:3x400%] damage.
Also deals an additional #[offense:3x100% damage per second] while #[offense:bleeding] enemies.
Can #[offense:strike] enemies again on the way back.
Cooldown: #[misc:45s]

Scanner.name: 雷达扫描装置
Scanner.description:
#[misc:Reveal] all interactables within 500m for #[misc:10 seconds].
Cooldown: #[misc:45s]

missinguid_goragsOpus.name: 古拉格的杰作
missinguid_goragsOpus.description:
All allies enter a #[offense:frenzy] for #[misc:7] seconds. Increases #[misc:movement speed] by #[misc:50%] and #[offense:attack speed] by #[offense:100%].
Cooldown: #[misc:45s]
